answers.answer: Depending on how advanced it is determines which method of treatment they will do. Some use a pill glyburide and some may choose insulin. But it can also be managed with your diet first and foremost. It can lead to you having a big baby, preterm labor in some women, and sometimes the recovery is a little tougher after delivery.

question: Ok... so I'm a ftm and i just found out the I failed my 1 hour glucose test and now i have to go in for the 3 hour test. What do they do if i fail this one to? What it the treatment for gestational diabetes? How to you monitor it? How dangerous is it for my baby boy?
title: gestational diabetes...please help!
